00021 #ifndef FILE_H_
00022 #define FILE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include "String.h"
00026 #include "Iterator.h"
00027 #include "Iterable.h"
00028 
00029 // Adapted from The Boost Libraries, v1.39.0. Original license follows:
00030 
00031 //  boost/filesystem/path.hpp  -----------------------------------------------//
00032 
00033 //  Copyright Beman Dawes 2002-2005
00034 //  Copyright Vladimir Prus 2002
00035 
00036 //  Distributed under the Boost Software License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying
00037 //  file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00038 
00039 //  See library home page at http://www.boost.org/libs/filesystem
00040 
00041 //  basic_path's stem(), extension(), and replace_extension() are based on
00042 //  basename(), extension(), and change_extension() from the original
00043 //  filesystem/convenience.hpp header by Vladimir Prus.

00046 
00047 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00048 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00049 
00050 class File : public virtual Object {
00051 public:
00052 
00053     class iterator : public BidirectionalIterator<String, iterator> {
00054  friend class File;
00055     public:
00056         typedef BidirectionalIterator<String,iterator> super;
00057         iterator(bool begin = false, const File* obj = NULL);
00058         iterator(bool begin = false, File* obj = NULL);
00059 
00060         reference current() const {
00061             return cur;
00062         }
00063         void next() const;
00064         bool hasNext() const;
00065 
00066         bool equals(const iterator& other) const {
00067             return file == other.file && cur == other.cur && pos == other.pos;
00068         }
00069 
00070         iterator(const iterator& other) {
00071             file = other.file;
00072             cur = other.cur;
00073             pos = other.pos;
00074         }
00075         bool hasPrevious() const;
00076         void previous() const;
00077     private:
00078         File * file;
00079         mutable String cur;
00080         mutable idx_t pos;
00081     };
00082 
00083     S_ITERABLE(String)
00084 public:
00085 
00086     File() {
00087     }
00088 
00089     File(const String s) {
00090         operator/=(s);
00091     }
00092     File(const char* s) {
00093         operator/=(String(s));
00094     }
00095 
00096     ~File() {
00097     }
00098 
00099     File & removeFilename();
00100     File & replaceExtension(const String newExt = String());
00101 
00102     const String toString() const {
00103         return path;
00104     }
00105 
00106     // file_string
00107     const String nativeString() const;
00108 
00109     File rootPath() const;
00110     String rootName() const;
00111     String rootDirectory() const;
00112     File relativePath() const;
00113     File parent() const;
00114     String filename() const;
00115     String stem() const;
00116     String extension() const;
00117 
00118     bool empty() const {
00119         return path == "";
00120     }
00121     bool complete() const;
00122     bool hasRootPath() const;
00123     bool hasRootName() const;
00124     bool hasRootDirectory() const;
00125 
00126     bool hasRelativePath() const {
00127         return !relativePath().empty();
00128     }
00129 
00130     bool hasFilename() const {
00131         return path != "";
00132     }
00133 
00134     bool hasParent() const {
00135         return !parent().empty();
00136     }
00137 
00138     File & operator=(const String s) {
00139         path = "";
00140         operator/=(s);
00141         return *this;
00142     }
00143 
00144     File & operator/=(const File & rhs) {
00145         return operator /=(rhs.toString());
00146     }
00147 
00148     File & operator/=(const String);
00149 
00150 private:
00151     void appendSeparatorIfNeeded();
00152     void append(uchar c);
00153 
00154     String path;
00155 };
00156 
00157 bool operator==(const File& lhs, const File& rhs);
00158 bool operator<(const File& lhs, const File& rhs);
00159 inline File operator/(const File& lhs, const File& rhs) {
00160     return File(lhs) /= rhs;
00161 }
00162 
00163 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00164 
00165 #endif /* FILE_H_ */
